metadata.title: CVE-2018-19865 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A keystroke logging issue was discovered in Virtual Keyboard in Qt 5.7.x,5.8.x, 5.9.x, 5.10.x, and 5.11.x before 5.11.3.

criterions.comment: qtvirtualkeyboard-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
